entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The discussion highlights the importance of having a manageable number of Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) editors, suggesting that a smaller group of 2-3 dedicated individuals is more effective than a larger group where responsibilities are diluted. This perspective aligns with concerns regarding the efficiency and commitment of BIP editors, noting that even highly capable individuals such as Roasbeef may not have the capacity to manage additional responsibilities. There's also a mention of uncertainties around the inclusion of certain individuals in the list of BIP editors, particularly pointing out names like Seccour, who apparently have not been active in relevant forums or discussions for an extended period. The emphasis here is on the need for active, engaged, and capable editors within the Bitcoin development ecosystem to ensure progress and accountability.
